ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to gladiator@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: To get the full version of gladiator over the Internet, go to www.alberts.com.  While there is no way to prove to your dad that his credit card transaction
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 14
Message-ID: <17248.14.33.959279670@...>
Date: Wed, 10 Feb 1999 09:05:38 -0500
From: Steve Wright <slwright@...
Subject: Re: Welcome to gladiator@onelist.com

To get the full version of gladiator over the Internet, go to 
www.alberts.com.  While there is no way to "prove" to your dad that his 
credit card transaction is secure, you can tell him that thousands of 
people have purchased games from this site, and there hasn't been a single 
reported case of credit card fraud as a result.  Using a credit card to 
purchase products online is no more or less safe than using a credit card 
at your local software store, and is probably safer than using it over the 
phone to say, a mail order company.  If that doesn't work, you can probably 
send a check or money order, but you'd have to ask the guys at forgotten 
sages about that.

-----Original Message-----
From:	matt starkey [SMTP:basicmatt@...]
Sent:	Tuesday, February 09, 1999 2:32 AM
To:	gladiator@onelist.com
Subject:	[gladiator] Re: Welcome to gladiator@onelist.com

From: "matt starkey" <basicmatt@...>

Hi!
     How do I get the full version of Gladiator?  Is there any way that
you can proveto my dad that it will be safe to give you his credit card
number so I can order it on the internet?  If not, please tell me how
much it costs and what your address is so I can order it through the
mail.  Thanks!
